title: XING Logo
content:
Can someone help me identify the font used on this logo?  
Thanks in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701143531im_/http:/typophile.com/files/csm_XingEvents_Logo_1000x192_04_0e3533daf3_5026.jpg)
author: djunke

comments.content:
Similar but not quite the same, unless it is a custom version of it.  
This is another screenshot from a presentation from them. It uses the same font as the logo.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701143531im_/http:/typophile.com/files/improved_6605.png)

They also seem to use a version without rounded corners (probably the round corners are just a simple round edge stroke)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701143531im_/http:/typophile.com/files/network_6232.png)

If I clearly remember, Xing uses (a slightly customized version of) [Notes](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701143531/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/primetype/notes) PTL. Soft(ened) version [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701143531/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/primetype/notes-soft).
